(Not documented)

    # File lib/rack/auth/digest/params.rb, line 14
14:         def self.dequote(str) # From WEBrick::HTTPUtils
15:           ret = (/\A"(.*)"\Z/ =~ str) ? $1 : str.dup
16:           ret.gsub!(/\\(.)/, "\\1")
17:           ret
18:         end

parse(str) click to toggle source

(Not documented)

    # File lib/rack/auth/digest/params.rb, line 6
 6:         def self.parse(str)
 7:           split_header_value(str).inject(new) do |header, param|
 8:             k, v = param.split('=', 2)
 9:             header[k] = dequote(v)
10:             header
11:           end
12:         end
split_header_value(str) click to toggle source

(Not documented)

    # File lib/rack/auth/digest/params.rb, line 20
20:         def self.split_header_value(str)
21:           str.scan( /(\w+\=(?:"[^\"]+"|[^,]+))/n ).collect{ |v| v[0] }
22:         end

47:         def quote(str) # From WEBrick::HTTPUtils
48:           '"' << str.gsub(/[\\\"]/o, "\\\1") << '"'

to_s() click to toggle source

(Not documented)

    # File lib/rack/auth/digest/params.rb, line 40
40:         def to_s
41:           inject([]) do |parts, (k, v)|
42:             parts << "#{k}=" + (UNQUOTED.include?(k) ? v.to_s : quote(v))
43:             parts
44:           end.join(', ')
45:         end
